20110117235518.000|20110117235520.000|CC1|That's the day you do something.
20110117235520.000|20110117235521.000|CC1|       Depression hurts.        
20110117235521.000|20110117235521.000|CC1|  Cymbalta can help with many   
20110117235521.000|20110117235525.000|CC1|    symptoms of depression.     
20110117235525.000|20110117235525.000|CC1| Tell your doctor right away if 
20110117235525.000|20110117235527.000|CC1|    your depression worsens,    
20110117235527.000|20110117235527.000|CC1|  you have unusual changes in   
20110117235527.000|20110117235530.000|CC1|behavior or thoughts of suicide.
20110117235530.000|20110117235530.000|CC1|  Antidepressants can increase  
20110117235530.000|20110117235530.000|CC1| these in children, teens, and  
20110117235530.000|20110117235534.000|CC1|         young adults.          
20110117235534.000|20110117235534.000|CC1|  Cymbalta is not approved for  
20110117235534.000|20110117235536.000|CC1|       children under 18.       
20110117235536.000|20110117235536.000|CC1|     People taking MAOIs or     
20110117235536.000|20110117235538.000|CC1|          thioridazine          
20110117235538.000|20110117235538.000|CC1| or with uncontrolled glaucoma  
20110117235538.000|20110117235541.000|CC1|   should not take Cymbalta.    
20110117235541.000|20110117235541.000|CC1|   Taking it with NSAID pain    
20110117235541.000|20110117235543.000|CC1|           relievers,           
20110117235543.000|20110117235543.000|CC1| aspirin, or blood thinners may 
20110117235543.000|20110117235545.000|CC1|    increase bleeding risk.     
20110117235545.000|20110117235545.000|CC1|  Severe liver problems, some   
20110117235545.000|20110117235548.000|CC1|     fatal, we reported.        
20110117235548.000|20110117235548.000|CC1|Signs include abdominal pain and
20110117235548.000|20110117235551.000|CC1| yellowing of the skin or eyes. 
20110117235551.000|20110117235551.000|CC1|Talk with your doctor about your
20110117235551.000|20110117235553.000|CC1|           medicines,           
20110117235553.000|20110117235553.000|CC1|including those for migraine, or
20110117235553.000|20110117235556.000|CC1|    if you have high fever,     
20110117235556.000|20110117235557.000|CC1|  confusion and stiff muscles,  
20110117235557.000|20110117235557.000|CC1|     to address a possible      
20110117235557.000|20110117235559.000|CC1|  life-threatening condition.   
20110117235559.000|20110117235559.000|CC1| Tell your doctor about alcohol 
20110117235559.000|20110117235602.000|CC1|      use, liver disease,       
20110117235602.000|20110117235602.000|CC1| and before you reduce or stop  
20110117235602.000|20110117235604.000|CC1|        taking Cymbalta.        
20110117235604.000|20110117235604.000|CC1|Dizziness or fainting may occur 
20110117235604.000|20110117235606.000|CC1|         upon standing.

20110117235606.000|20110117235610.000|CC1|    mouth, and constipation.
